column4: Im having some problems since upgrading to hardy, scrolling in firefox is choppy, video playback is laggy, the whole gnome interface is laggy, tried to mess with the ati/open source video drivers and the x config to no avail. Any ideas? google found several similar cases but i didnt find any solution.
